name: laxar-details-layer-widget
description: Displays a simple details layer, growing from a source element with animation to its full size.

name.description: Name of the area to offer for contents.

open.description: Open the details layer upon action request.

onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger opening of the details layer.

resetPosition.description: If true (default) the popup content will be scrolled to top when opened.

close.description: Close the details layer upon action request.

onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger closing of the details layer.

action.description: Name of the action that is published when the layer is closed and all animations are finished.

closeIcon.description: Allow the user to close the details layer using an icon or the escape key.

enabled.description: If true the popup is closed when escape key or the close icon is pressed.

backdropClose.description: Allow the user to close the popup by a backdrop click.

enabled.description: If true the popup is closed when the backdrop is clicked.

activeElement.description: If true the layer will grow from the current active element when the event is received.

actionSelectorPath.description: JSON path to the action event property to interpret as css selector to animate from.

skipAnimations.description: Configuration for skipping the opening animations.

actionSelectorPath.description: JSON path to the action event property holding a boolean value whether animations should be skipped.

navigation.description: Specify a parameter name and value to enable URL representation of this layer's visiblity state

parameterName.description: Place parameter to use for indicating the currently visible details

parameterValue.description: Parameter value associated with opening this details layer instance.

logTag.description: Configuration for a log tag to set while the layer is opened

name.description: Name of the log tag. Should be four upper case letters.
